properties.address: The Signal Box Community Centre, Cambridge, Cambridgeshire CB2 8DB
properties.description: Everyone is welcome to our Warm Wednesdays from 26th November 2025 to 25th February 2026. We are a cosy community hub (near the train station) offering a warm welcome, free hot drinks, a space to talk, create or work together. 11am - 4pm every Wednesday.
properties.title: Signal Box Centre

properties.address: St. Andrews Street Baptist Church, Cambridgeshire CB2 3AR
properties.description: Our space is open from 9.30am to about 4.00pm Monday to Friday as a warm space, with free hot drinks, wifi, a place to sit in quiet or to plug in your laptop or phone, toilets, and often someone to chat to. On Saturdays the same space is used by FoodCycle, a separate organisation, to provide a free community lunch (freshly cooked, hot, vegetarian) at 12.30pm every week. Access via passageway to the right of the main church doors.
properties.title: St Andrew's Street Baptist Church

properties.address: St Bene’t’s Church, Bene’t Street, Cambridge, Cambridgeshire CB2 3PT
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 8th November 2023** Open all afternoon on Wednesdays. Free hot drinks and cakes/biscuits 2-4pm
properties.title: St Bene’t’s Church

properties.address: St. Benets Church, Cambridge, Cambridgeshire CB2 3PT
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 13th November 2024** This space is open to all. Work tables available and a small carpeted area for children to play.
properties.title: St Bene’t’s Church, Cambridge

properties.address: St Paul's Church, CAMBRIDGE, Cambridge CB2 1JP CB2 1JP
properties.description: We are a parish church and community centre. We run a number of community meals during the week as well as some activities. We are always available for anyone in an emergency needing a warm space. In addition, we are Foodbank distribution centre on Mondays 4-5.30pm and Fridays 2.30-4.30pm. A hot drink and snacks are available during these times. Monday - toddler group 10-11.30am Monday- simple supper 6-7.30pm Thursday - Lunch Club 12-2pm Friday - Lunch Club 12-2pm
properties.title: St Paul's Church

properties.address: Teversham Community Club, CB1 9AQ

properties.title: Teversham Community Hub

properties.address: 2 Brooks Road, Cambridge, Cambs CB1 3HR
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 22nd November 2023** Open from 22/11/23 Wednesdays: 6pm - 7.30pm. Come into the warm for company, conversation, games and some hot soup and baguette. Fridays: 12pm-2pm for hot food, conversation and company.
properties.title: The C3 Church

properties.address: 3 Tenison Road, Cambridge, Cambridgeshire CB1 2DG
properties.description: Open from Tuesday 29 October 2024 to Friday 28 March 2025 Tuesdays-Fridays 10am-2pm Free wifi, hot drinks and refreshments are available. Also baby-changing and shower facilities are available.
properties.title: The Salvation Army Community Hub

properties.address: Trumpington Meadows Primary School, Cambridgeshire CB2 9AY
properties.description: A warm friendly space open to everyone. You will be greeted with a warm welcome and a smile from our volunteers who love to chat to you over a cuppa. Try our home made lunch, a rainbow of salad, a cup of soup, dhal or chilli and home made bake. We offer child's play, crafts, sing songs, story telling and you can take home free surplus food form the community pantry. Try out our recipe bags with the food you had for lunch at home. We have a well being walk too. Our information hub and staff can help to connect you to supporting agencies with help with housing, well being or cost of living issues.
properties.title: Trumpington Meadows Community Hub

properties.address: Central Library Cambridge, Cambridge, Cambridgeshire CB2 3QD
properties.description: Tea and biscuits on the third floor of the library. No library membership needed to participate, space is accessible via stairs, escalators and lifts. Users of the Warm Hub are welcome to stay for as long as they wish for the duration of library opening hours, the times listed here just indicate the availability of warm drinks and snacks in addition to our usual offer.
properties.title: Warm Hub at Central Library, Cambridge
